comment: So Soros is Jewish? Huh. Is Boot Jewish too? It's almost as if "conservative" Max Boot is more concerned about a "liberal" of his own tribe than about abstract ideological considerations like "liberal" or "conservative." Or something. I wonder if other powerful/ influential Jews feel the same way?
